fullText:
Fate Favors the Bold

Epic Tier
Prerequisite: 21st level, warlord, Bravura Presence class feature
Benefit: Whenever an ally makes a basic attack granted by your Bravura Presence, the ally gains a bonus to the damage roll equal to your Charisma modifier.
Whenever an ally takes a move action granted by your Bravura Presence, the ally gains a bonus to speed during that move equal to your Charisma modifier.

Published in Martial Power 2, page(s) 144.
